feature_list.description_1: Get notified instantly when a new indicator is available.
feature_list.description_2: Support for both Discord and Telegram integrations.
feature_list.description_3: Receive indicators via webhooks and integrate your own trading bot.
feature_list.description_4: Get access to historical indicators using the MarketRaker API.
mkr_pro_required: NO ACCESS - MKR Pro Access required
